item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello There Link to heading My name is Linghao Zhang. I am a Master Student at ETH ZÃ¼rich studying Robotics. My core competency is in Robotics control. I have worked with ANYmal and ALMA in ETH’s Robotic Systems Lab, with a focus on MPC an QP Controller. My main development language/framework is C++ and ROS. Hobbies Link to heading As a self-taught and self-hosting Linux admin, I manage some Linux boxes and VMs, knowing my way around DevOps tools like Ansible and nix.
